## This is my plot! It represents the glucose level in some patients.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(plotly)

data <- data.frame("patient" = c("patient1", "patient2", "patient3"), "glucose" = c(300, 200, 350))
  
plot_ly(data, x = data$patient, y = data$glucose, mode = "markers")
```
